Their promiscuity, lack of modesty, and refusal to submit to male authority have led to the decay of our great civilization. We must restore the honor and dignity of men, and women must be held accountable for their transgressions.

To spread our message, we will utilize all available channels: social media, public gatherings, and influential figures. We will not be silenced or swayed by the weak-minded and the liberal elites who seek to undermine our mission.
